use.flag: Install additional script that tag files based on cue/toc file information

pkgmetadata.longdescription: cuetools is a set of utilities for working with Cue Sheet (cue) and Table of Contents (toc) files. It includes: cueconvert convert between the cue and toc formats cuebreakpoints print the breakpoints from a cue or toc file cueprint print disc and track infomation for a cue or toc file
